Articles.Content:
Hello!

There's a killer heatwave in my area (like 40+ Celsius), therefore I'm stuck at home. I got pretty bored in these days, so I tried making some pixelarts. Here are two examples.

This is an Airbus A330-200 (RR Trent 700 engines) made from scratch. I used blueprints, and some of my photos as reference. 1 meter is roughly 3 pixels.

![4wzXFfb.png](http://i.imgur.com/4wzXFfb.png)

And this is a Nikon camera (it started out as a D7100), and a flash (an SB-600, maybe?).

![k0hhQf8.png](http://i.imgur.com/k0hhQf8.png)![be8fbcC.png](http://i.imgur.com/be8fbcC.png)

I find creating pixelart a fun way to "waste" time. If you feel the same, feel free to post your drawings! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-25T19:09:15Z" title="07/25/2015 07:09  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 25, 2015</time> by jmiki8**

One of my favorite pieces of pixel art (certainly not made by me):

![tumblr_n501rtro1u1tah9pwo1_1280.gif](https://38.media.tumblr.com/d19d39c584a7cc69ce02030125282990/tumblr_n501rtro1u1tah9pwo1_1280.gif)

Four colors of pixel, simply amazing.

I've been experimenting a bit with pixel art:

![Gj1r5eX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Gj1r5eX.jpg)

Palette in the upper right corner

Wow, really nice stuff! I made a little platformer game in Delphi, but I couldn't draw adequate sprites for it, so I dropped the project.

I made 2 new "repaints" of the A332 in the OP.

Air China livery (don't even try to read the Chinese letters ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ) :

![BxBEzL6.png](http://i.imgur.com/BxBEzL6.png)

KLM livery, with GE CF6 engines, "just like in real life":

![1VokVOL.png](http://i.imgur.com/1VokVOL.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T21:04:44Z" title="07/26/2015 09:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by jmiki8**

The only Pixelart I've ever made:

![FTMSeaSystemsLogo-LetterShadows-BIG.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-K0kfSjLcrdQ/VDMA_4R3UNI/AAAAAAAAAjw/K8aGCb6Qnr4/s752-Ic42/FTMSeaSystemsLogo-LetterShadows-BIG.png)
I am quite good at small game sprites, but big projects seem to spooky to me and I also don't have a lot of creativity for such large things.

Maybe I'm better at these now. Here's some old ones of mine. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![cUXRd5J.png](http://i.imgur.com/cUXRd5J.png)![QZuOGs0.png](http://i.imgur.com/QZuOGs0.png)

They're black in the background because A) I didn't know how to do transparencies and ![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) The game background was black.
This inspired me to start pixel arting tonight.
